Do not hide their crime and do not let their sin be blotted out in your sight, for they insulted the builders to their faces!
The king took the remaining half of the army and set out from Antioch, his capital, in the year one hundred and forty-seven; he crossed the Euphrates River and went through the provinces beyond.
When the king asked Heliodorus what sort of person would be suitable to be sent to Jerusalem next, he answered:
Who speaks so that it comes to pass, unless the Lord commands it?
C. Wisdom Contained in the Law - He has uncovered the whole way of understanding, and has given her to Jacob, his servant, to Israel, his beloved.
For we are reduced, O Lord, beyond any other nation, brought low everywhere in the world this day because of our sins.
